etomica.association

Class AssociationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.association.AssociationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource<AtomArrayList>, IListener

    public class AssociationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource<AtomArrayList>, IListener
    Class to define and track atom associations. Constructed given an iterator that defines the set of atoms that is managed, and an association definition that is used to determine if atoms are associated. Only pairwise associations are considered. To incorporate an instance of this class in a simulation, add an instance of this EnergySum inner class to the simulation:
    sim.setEnergySum(associationManager.new EnergySum()); If a MC simulation, this should be done before any MCMove classes are instantiated. Also, register this as a listener to IntegratorMC:
    integrator.addMCMoveListener(associationManager);
